ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.summary: R bindings of the 'uchardet', encoding detector library from Mozilla (<https://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/uchardet/>). It takes a sequence of bytes in an unknown character encoding and without any additional information, and attempts to get the encoding of the text. All return names of the encodings are iconv-compatible.

R bindings of the 'uchardet', encoding detector library from Mozilla (<https://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/uchardet/>). It takes a sequence of bytes in an unknown character encoding and without any additional information, and attempts to get the encoding of the text. All return names of the encodings are iconv-compatible.

name: r-uchardet

about.summary: R bindings of the 'uchardet', encoding detector library from Mozilla (<https://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/uchardet/>). It takes a sequence of bytes in an unknown character encoding and without any additional information, and attempts to get the encoding of the text. All return names of the encodings are iconv-compatible.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-uchardet
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/uchardet_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/uchardet/uchardet_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b23129aa6a8abdfb7118e8b469abdb9e4a3a1ccb9ca50627ec0d577d00f27d54

build:
  number: 3
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ stdlib("m2w64_c") }}          # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('uchardet')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('uchardet')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://artemklevtsov.gitlab.io/uchardet, https://gitlab.com/artemklevtsov/uchardet
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: R bindings of the 'uchardet', encoding detector library from Mozilla (<https://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/uchardet/>). It takes a sequence of bytes in an unknown character encoding and without any additional information, and attempts to get the encoding of the text. All return names of the encodings are
    iconv-compatible.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: uchardet
# Type: Package
# Title: The Universal Character Encoding Detector
# Description: R bindings of the 'uchardet', encoding detector library from Mozilla (<https://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/uchardet/>). It takes a sequence of bytes in an unknown character encoding and without any additional information, and attempts to get the encoding of the text. All return names of the encodings are iconv-compatible.

It takes a sequence of bytes in an unknown character encoding and without any additional information, and attempts to get the encoding of the text.
